sequence.speaker: QUINT
sequence.text: Fresh off the boat, aye? Welcome to Eventyr.

sequence.speaker: QUINT
sequence.text: …Run into any sharks? I haven’t seen ‘em yet, but I know they’re out there. Big ones. Swallow you whole.

sequence.speaker: QUINT
sequence.text: One of these days, I’m gonna tell the kids I’m going fishing and catch myself something real big.

sequence.speaker: QUINT
sequence.text: I’m gonna need a bigger fishing rod.
